tourSteps.text: This is the introduction to VisualAPI
Here you can find blocks for VisualCode  API ! Expand to investigate and drag
Here you can find blocks for basic constructs : loops, text, bool, logic ...
Drag here blocks to execute them
Here you will find examples to get started
to reuse you can download / load  the blocks from here
Press the execute button to run ;-)
Press the output button to see the result of blocks
Here you can find the output as text, html and json
Now press run and see , via HTTP, a joke with Chuck Norris
